get.summary: Get ApprecInfo for the message's ApplicationReceipt. if any.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of message, as received from GET Messages endpoint (must be a valid Guid)

parameters.name: nhn-source-system
parameters.description: Name and version for the client system

400.description: Bad request - The request was cancelled

403.description: Forbidden - Authenticated client is not authorized to access message with given id

500.description: Internal server error - Unexpected server error

200.description: OK - A list with statuses for message with given id

404.description: Not found - Message with given id could not be found

get.summary: Get a list of unread messages

parameters.name: ReceiverHerIds
parameters.description: Which messages sent to given HER-ids (one or more) to fetch.

parameters.name: SenderHerId
parameters.description: HER-id of sender (default = null).

parameters.name: BusinessDocumentId
parameters.description: MsgId in business document (default = null).

parameters.name: IncludeMetadata
parameters.description: Whether to include metadata or only include Id and ReceiverHerId of Message in results (default = false).

parameters.name: MessagesToFetch
parameters.description: How many messages to fetch (default = 10) (If set, must be a number between 1 and 100).

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
How to order results (based on GenDate in business document) (default = 1).

- 1 = Ascending

- 2 = Descending

parameters.name: nhn-source-system
parameters.description: Name and version for the client system

400.description: Bad request - The request body contained invalid data or the request was cancelled

403.description: Forbidden - Authenticated client is not authorized to access messages with given HerIds

500.description: Internal server error - Unexpected server error

200.description: OK - A list with unread messages matching query parameters

post.summary: Send an application receipt for a message
post.description:
AppRecStatus must be 1 ('OK'), 2 ('Avvist') or 3 ('Ok, feil i delmelding')

AppRecErrorList must be populated if AppRecResult is 'Avvist'

AppRecErrorList.Details is optional

parameters.description: The HER-id of the sender of the application receipt

parameters.name: nhn-source-system
parameters.description: Name and version for the client system

Some systems expect the businessdocument to be compressed before encrypted and added to Ebxml.
When set to 'true' the payload will be compressed using the Gzip algorithm

businessDocument.description:
The business document - Payload.

The BusinessDocument is the raw bytes of the payload encoded with ContentTransferEncoding

Content type for the business document.

Most payloads should be xml

contentTransferEncoding.description:
Content transfer encoding for the business document.

Payload is always base64-encoded.

id.description:
Internal id of message. To be used when using messages/{id}/*-endpoints.

Will always be a valid Guid

contentType.description: Content type for the business document

senderHerId.description: HER-id of sender (will not be present if includeMetadata = false).

businessDocumentId.description: MsgId in business document (will not be present if includeMetadata = false).

businessDocumentGenDate.description: GenDate in business document (will not be present if includeMetadata = false).

isAppRec.description: Whether business document is an application receipt (will not be present if includeMetadata = false).

OrderBy.description: How to order results based on GenDate in business document.

appRecStatus.description:
The status of the application receipt sent for a received message

1 = Ok, 2 = Avvist, 3 = Ok, feil i delmelding

appRecErrorList.description: List of errors in application receipt

ebXmlOverrides.description:
One or more EbXml-properties can be provided if business process has special requirements.

For most business processes the values can and will be resolved from the business document
by the server, and therefore does not have to be applied twice.
Current implementation is following 'HIS 1037:2011' and 'HIS 1209:2018'

businessDocument.description:
The business document - Payload.

It is required that the encoding in the XML-document is UTF-8, and that this is declared in the first line.
Example: `<xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" />`.

The payload must be of type and encoding as specified in ContentType and ContentTransferEncoding, meaning that the
payload should always be an XML-document as a base64-encoded string.
